attributes.name: Leafwrapped Spear
attributes.description: "The cycle of life binds us all."
attributes.parsed_description: "The cycle of life binds us all."

attributes.name: Leandra's Demise
attributes.description: "Slain by her own spear, Leandra would rather die than serve in the corrupted legions."

attributes.name: Legacy of the Makers
attributes.description: "Monuments of the power of the Ancients are scattered across Aeternum. Their guardians remain as a testament to what they built, and why they left."
attributes.parsed_description: "Monuments of the power of the Ancients are scattered across Aeternum. Their guardians remain as a testament to what they built, and why they left."

attributes.name: Legatus General's Buckler
attributes.description: "This buckler has been through hell and back, surviving the worst of what was up against thrown at the Legatus General."
attributes.parsed_description: "This buckler has been through hell and back, surviving the worst of what was up against thrown at the Legatus General."

attributes.name: Ley Line
attributes.description: "The bow acts as a conduit, funneling arcane energy into itself."
attributes.parsed_description: "The bow acts as a conduit, funneling arcane energy into itself."

attributes.name: Liberator Of Souls
attributes.description: Be free, now, of your fleshbound prison. Rest until we meet again."
attributes.parsed_description: Be free, now, of your fleshbound prison. Rest until we meet again."

attributes.name: Lie of Omission
attributes.description: "I did not tell you I killed him because I felt it to be of no consequence."
attributes.parsed_description: "I did not tell you I killed him because I felt it to be of no consequence."

attributes.name: Lieutenant General's Blade
attributes.description: My legions are vast. This continent is ours to conquer."
attributes.parsed_description: My legions are vast. This continent is ours to conquer."

attributes.name: Lifebinder
attributes.description: "So long as I may walk this earth, you shall live."
attributes.parsed_description: "So long as I may walk this earth, you shall live."

attributes.name: Life Breaker
attributes.description: "I have become death. The destroyer of worlds."
attributes.parsed_description: "I have become death. The destroyer of worlds."
